meanings.definition: The hard white substance forming the tusks of elephants and other animals.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful piano keys were made of ivory.
meanings.sent2: The intricate carving on the elephant's ivory tusk was stunning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to steal the ivory tusks from the museum.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pure and smooth as ivory.
meanings.sent5: The ivory tusks gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of strength and beauty.

meanings.sent1: The artist mixed white and yellow to create a lovely shade of ivory.
meanings.sent2: The wedding dress was a beautiful ivory color.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a touch of ivory to the frosting for a hint of elegance.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky had a soft ivory hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The ivory walls of the palace gave it a regal and timeless look.

meanings.sent1: She wore a stunning ivory necklace to the gala.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had an ivory frame that added a touch of sophistication.
meanings.sent3: The cozy blanket felt as soft as ivory against her skin.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an ivory smoothness that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The elegant chair was upholstered in luxurious ivory fabric.
